data.title: The Georgian Villa Rica GA Homes For Sale
data.meta_description: Homes for sale in the Georgian subdivision located in Villa Rica, Ga. Read about the 13 Acre Amenity Park and social life within the Georgian, the Frog Golf Course GA.
data.text:
The Georgian Villa Rica GA

Homes For Sale

Bring the Family to this Master Planned Community located in Villa Rica GA. The Georgian subdivision amenities include a 13 Acre Amenity Park with a water park which includes a professional water slide, and a zero entry pool. The kids in the Georgian enjoy this feature and often the parents are seen plummeting down the water slide for entertainment as well. Additional amenities include about 8 lighted professional tennis courts, a second Olympic size pool by the Course, a full court basketball court, a sand volleyball court, an imagination station for the kids, a full playground which includes many features including sand boxes, slides, jungle gyms and even a pirate ship. The amenity areas in the Georgian also include paved walking and biking trails, park benches, a garden area for the garden club and even an amphitheater for Spring and Summer movie nights. There are many social activities which include holiday events such as an Annual Easter egg hunt for the kids, fall festivities, etc. Also, in the Georgian Villa Rica Ga, there are many clubs and events for adults including game nights, book clubs, exercise classes, TV show following clubs, the gardening club, knitting, bible studies and much more!

The Georgian was originally planned to be a golf resort built and funded by the Marriot hotels however investors decided to sell the property to Cousins Developers in order to develop the Georgian as a residential single family neighborhood. The Master Plan boasts about 1400 proposed homes but still has much to be developed. The Georgian in Villa Rica, Ga is well known in the community for its award winning The Frog Golf Course. The Frog is a Tom Fazio designed golf course that has recently received a four and a half star rating from Golf Digest. Many tournaments and events have taken place there including the Georgia Open, Five Star Celebrity Classic, and a John Smoltz Celebrity Players Tournament. Even Michael Jordan has been seen playing on this pristine course.

See each section in The Georgian explained below the pictures.

Homes for sale in The Georgian

Homes for sale in the Georgian vary in price range and styles. Homes offer Craftsmen, Traditional, and Ranch plans in style and include the latest features buyers are seeking. They are many different sections in the subdivision to choose from and we are here to help you decide which section is best for you.

Addison at The Georgian-Artisan New Homes

Addison at The Georgian in Villa Rica GA homes for sale just sold out by Artisan home builders. However Artisan home builders are building new basement lots in the main section of The Georgian. The homes are going to be farmhouse style homes geared towards single family homes that are not age restricted. Homes by Artisan are included in the search below.

Heritage Pointe at the Georgian

Heritage Pointe at the Georgian is a gated Active 55+ community that offers easy living Ranch style homes with lawn maintenance included. Many of the homes in Heritage Pointe are adjacent to The Frog golf course. It's an easy golf cart ride to the course. Homes in Heritage Pointe section is listed below.

Wentworth at The Georgian

This is the new homes section that Silverstone communities is building in. The lots are fairly wooded and are tucked away in the interior of The Georgian. Silverstone is a medium size builder that builds all over Metro Atlanta. This section is worth considering and is building out fast.

Manchester At The Georgian

These are the premium golf course lots that boast the most expensive homes for sale in the subdivision. There are new homes in this section ready to be built.
